text: 2:19 Jon 8:34; Rom 6:16; 1 Pita 2:16Gumazamizir kurar kaba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kamaghɨn ia en gɨn mangɨva, egh ia fɨrighɨregh uan nɨghnɨzibar ifongezir bizibar amuam.” Men arazir kuraba me gasɨghasɨzima, me uari pura ingangarir gumazamiziba. E fo, gumazamiziba bizitam me ikɨrarightɨ, me bizir kamɨn pura ingangarir gumazamizibar mɨn ikiam.
